thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Verl Anderson

author: Verl Anderson
title: Verl Anderson
text:
Neil Patil is amazing. He was extremely customer service oriented, capable, and caring. He made me feel, as a customer, valuable and important. He was very diligent in obtaining 12 airfare tickets to China, and on the same airplane, even though we requested these over several days. I believe Neil Patil should be highly commended. FlightNetwork has a great ambassador
with Neil. Thank you,
Dr. Verl Anderson
